casebody.data:
No. 09-10095. Robert Allen Hall, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 561 U.S. 1053, 131 S. Ct. 55,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1144,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5726. September 3, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 560 U.S. 967, 130 S. Ct. 3415, 177 L. Ed. 2d 328, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 4783.
